sentences.en: Agencies which transgress this principle are not widely respected.
sentences.cn: 与此原则背道而驰的代理商势必无法广受尊崇.

sentences.en: If one does transgress against this command, one must perform teshuvah ( repentance ).
sentences.cn: 如果有人违反此令, 必须悔改.

sentences.en: Orton’s plays transgress accepted social norms.
sentences.cn: 奥顿的戏剧违背了公认的社会准则。

sentences.en: The twelve mansions of the stars will weep to see their inmates transgress so.
sentences.cn: 恒星的十二座大厦会看到它们的同住者(民)犯罪而哭泣.

sentences.en: There are also new restrictions on engine changes with grid penalties for those who transgress.
sentences.cn: 同时关于更换引擎也出台了新规则,谁违反规则,谁就要受到处罚.

sentences.en: To commit an offense or a sin; transgress or err.
sentences.cn: 冒犯违法或犯罪; ''.'违犯'. ''规章或犯错.

sentences.en: To show partiality is not good, Because for a piece of bread a man will transgress.
sentences.cn: 箴28:21看人的情面、乃为不好.人因一块饼枉法、也为不好.

sentences.en: Your words must't transgress the local laws .
sentences.cn: 你的言辞不能违反当地法律。

words.tran_cn: [地质] 海侵；犯罪；违反；逸出

trans.tran_cn: 违反, 犯罪, 侵犯
trans.tran_en: to do something that is against the rules of social behaviour or against a moral principle

trans.tran_cn: 做坏事，道德败坏，违反道德，犯法
越越限度；违反(法律规则)
